    Visit to University of Kassel Amateur Radio Club

    University of Kassel Amateur Radio Club station. Here I am with a sausage, received as honorarium for giving a lecture.

    Have not seen an Apple II in a while.

    HP 694A being repaired.

    Schnitzel dinner. (clockwise) Martin, Peter, Axel DL1FAK, Marcel DC5MB, Martin DC3MKB and myself VK2APL. Axel is professor in microwave electronics and Martin visited the MWRS in Sydney earlier this year. I am collaborating in research with Peter and the two Martin’s (which was the actual purpose of the visit).

    Club antenna.

    Categories: amateur radio, hobbies, travel

    Updated: July 05, 2018
